domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
After I was shot, I spent days relying on a ventilator to breathe, as many are now. But in experiencing the worst, I discovered what it takes to endure.

Today, I’m sharing what I’ve learned in the hopes that it may help others find their way forward, too. https://t.co/xm3t7NbFrE
